Wrapping HTTP errors in Elm

Tom Schaefer January 18, 2012
  • elm
  • web

When handling HTTP requests in elm, sometimes it can be useful to add extra context to potential errors.

For example, it may be useful to include a record ID along with the Http.Error so that the UI for that specific record can be updated.
